item.title: Tip-Top Typing: A Look At Python Typing
item.description:
Description

Have you ever wondered how Python handles types? What does dynamic typing mean? How about duck typing? In this video, we'll look at what a type is in Python, as well as how to use it's most popular typechecker - mypy - to be more effective in using types.
item.dc:creator: Pat Viafore

item.title: Introduction To Docker / Python Microservices
item.description:
Description

Two talks: 1) How Docker helped save a company time and money by automated environment setup / A look at Python Microservices using celery
item.dc:creator: Kyle Galloway

item.title: Python3 Panel Talk
item.description:
Description

A moderated panel discussing what the Python 2 EOL means, the future of Python3, and how the community responds
